title: Dataset
description: Describes a dataset, and gives associated bibliographic informations. Datasets are a collection of networks, published in one or several studies.

id.description: Access code for the dataset in the local database.

description.description: A short description of the dataset.

papers.description: ID of the reference resource for the paper(s) in which the dataset was first published/used, or other significant papers related to this dataset.

data.description: ID of the resource for the data themselves (i.e. data paper, figshare or datadryad DOI, ...)
